'''Sea Salt-Crusted Key''' is a Quest Item found in [[Golden Apple Archipelago]] during the [[Summertime Odyssey]] event.

==Locations==
===Key #1===
One can found on a small island westernmost of [[Minacious Isle]], after breaking a pile of rocks.

===Key #2===
Another can be found after unlocking the earlier gate on Minacious Isle.
